channel.title: Just wondering if possible
channel.description:
i know im new here, but not new to java or p servers, i just dont have much knowledge of actual servers... would it be possible to not only have a webclient set up on a server (already done) but also to run the private server itself on that server? if that didn't make since, say i get the domain www.runescapebeforeshitupdates.com (lol, can you tell what im making :D) i know i could host the client on it, but is it possible to host the private server on it aswell??
thanks for any help

item.title: Just wondering if possible
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch Java Is My Bitch™
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch wrote:

alias1991:

no, basically, i want it to run like real runescape servers do lol, i dont want to host the server on MY computer, i want to host it on my hosting companys server

I don’t think so, they don’t really run those things lol.

Read full topic

item.title: Just wondering if possible
item.dc:creator: @Tenacious_T Tenacious T
item.description:
@Tenacious_T wrote:

Actually yes that is possible i beleive, but you must know how to code a little in HTML so you can add the applet and server code to the (file).HTML
